messages.subject: Speaking of battles
messages.msgSnippet: Speaking of battles there is a short reference to the Sozo brothers/clan samurai in Nitobes Code of Bushido. I beleive their is a Japanese(NHK) movie of their
messages.messageBody:
Speaking of battles there is a short reference to the Sozo brothers/clan
samurai in Nitobes Code of Bushido. I beleive their is a Japanese(NHK) movie
of their story out there too. I am seeeking any references, details etc on
them can anyone help?

Paul

messages.subject: battles of kawanakajima
messages.msgSnippet: hi, greetings to everyone.I was wondering if anyone here can help me thru my research regarding the events that occured before, during and after the battles of
messages.messageBody:
hi, greetings to everyone.I was wondering if anyone here can help me
thru my research regarding the events that occured before, during and
after the battles of kawanakajima. Please, if you know about some
reliable sources regarding the said subject, and useful articles on
both parties (Uesugi & Takeda), please email me at
reilly1221@.... thanks ^o^
